class.name: LibSM64AudioStreamPlayer
class.brief_description: A node for playing the audio produced by [code]libsm64[/code].
class.description: The [LibSM64AudioStreamPlayer] node plays the audio stream generated by [code]libsm64[/code]. [method LibSM64.audio_init] has to be called before the audio is available. Call the [method AudioStreamPlayer.play] method to start playing the audio.
